title.rendered: Sherlock Holmes: The Forty Thieves and Other Stories

content.rendered: This collection includes 11 fascinating whodunits in which Holmes uses his unmatched skills to fight a fatal threat to all mankind in The Adventure of the Fateful Malady, face terrifying beasts to catch a murderer in The Ululation of Wolves, meet his arch nemesis in The Strange Missive of Germaine Wilkes and even track down The Vanished Killer!
